-- | The Acme and AcmeT monads.
--   
--   The Acme and AcmeT monads.
@package monadacme
@version 0.0.1


module Control.Monad.Acme
newtype Acme a
Acme :: a -> Acme a
runAcme :: Acme a -> a
newtype Monad m => AcmeT m a
AcmeT :: m a -> AcmeT m a
runAcmeT :: AcmeT m a -> m a
instance Monad m => Monad (AcmeT m)
instance Monad Acme
